pages.title: Vein Mining
pages.text: _Still mining each ore individually? Gravity might make this easier._\\Vein Mining rips out all connected blocks.\\Max Level: 1\Applicable to all tools.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Vein Mining by surrounding your [Enchanter](entry://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](entry://general/pigment) and the other required materials.
